title: Upgrade laptop’s setup with this portable OLED monitor — Get $90 off
content:
Macworld

Have an emotional support laptop you bring along everywhere? We won’t judge. But If you’ve been looking to upgrade your portable setup, this OLED Portable Touchscreen Monitor answers your prayers. And you can take one home for $269.99 (reg. $359) with code DISPLAY30. 

See what this monitor can do

The Glance Plus OLED Portable Touchscreen Monitor is ideal for those who tote around their MacBook. It elevates the visual experience, offering crystal clear visuals whether you’re tackling work emails or immersed in your favorite game. And its 15.6″ display offers 1080p resolution and a 100,000:1 contrast ratio.

The OLED feature, which stands for Organic Light-Emitting Diode, rivals your usual LCD screen option, allowing your monitor to emit light at the pixel level without any backlight needed. This lets you enjoy your content both indoors and out. 

A straightforward plug-and-play setup means you don’t need any other drives or software installed; just plug it into your laptop, and you’re ready to rock. It even includes a durable smart cover that protects it from dust, scratches, and water damage while serving as a foldable stand. 

Save $60 and add this Portable Touchscreen Monitor to your setup for just $269.99 with code DISPLAY30.
